CustomField.formula: IF( AND(ISPICKVAL( animalos__Action_Status__c , 'Scheduled'), DATEVALUE( animalos__Date_Time_of_Action__c ) < TODAY() ) , IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_620, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_620)) + "resource/animalos__Note_Flags/Warning.png", 'Warning', 25, 25), '')
CustomField.label: Overdue
